name: anyclaude
description: Run Claude Code with OpenAI, Google, xAI, and others.

scripts.build: bun build --target node --outfile dist/main.js ./src/main.ts --format cjs --external ai --external @ai-sdk/* --external zod && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='dist/main.js';fs.writeFileSync(p,'#!/usr/bin/env node\n'+fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8'))" && chmod +x dist/main.js
